exact_source: Consideration for each of the acquisitions comprises the following (together “the Consideration Shares”): GUE to receive 35,000,000 fully paid ordinary shares in KNB (“KNB Shares”); and Shareholders of Gilmore Metals to receive 95,000,000 KNB Shares. Newmont Exploration has farm-in expenditure commitments on some of the acquired tenements (Junee and Fairholme), but these are commitments *by Newmont*, not by Koonenberry as a condition of acquiring Gilmore Metals or Enmore.
